Name: The Ball Adventure
About the game: To save the world from evil you must destroy the 5 crystals that are hidden throughout the world. You will need intelligence, skill, and a lot, but a lot of patience, to overcome difficult obstacles and fool your enemies. Dive into this wonderful cartoon world and learn to use the characteristics of each material to overcome challenges. You literally have to have balls to pass this game. MATERIALS: WOOD Wood is the most balanced material Average speed Medium jump The wind affects 20% Cannot float Not fire resistant ROCK Rock is the heaviest material Low speed Low jump It is not affected by the wind Cannot float It is fire resistant BEACH The beach ball is the lightest of all High speed High jump The wind affects you 100% Can float Not fire resistant TENNIS The tennis ball is the smallest High speed High jump It is not affected by the wind Cannot float Can sneak into small places Not fire resistant BALL OF LIGHT It is the only one capable of emitting light Low speed Low jump It is not affected by the wind Cannot float You can see in dark places Not fire resistant ENEMIES: TURRET ENEMY The enemy turret was designed to destroy everything that comes close to it. You must choose very well the material you need before facing it. ALLIED TURRET 'Find a way to make your enemies allies' You can turn your enemy turrets into allied turrets, you just have to find the way. MONSTER When a Monster sees you, it will chase you to death, over and over again. DEMON Demon feeds on the energy of our world through the 5 crystals. With the 5 crystals destroyed, Demon will die. He will be to blame for your failures, your frustration and your broken keyboard.
